title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare

(Export) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited animal health welfare (export) regulation 2024

title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: In these Regulations-
text_raw:
2.

In these Regulations-

“Animal Identification and Movement system” means an established and 
continuing animal tracing system (including a database) referred to in section 
63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European 
Union (Animal Identification and Tracing) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No 254 of 
2023); 

“food business operator” means a food business operator approved in 
accordance with regulation 5 of the European Communities (Food and Feed 
Hygiene) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 674 of 2019).
text_norm: 2 regulations- animal identification movement system mean established continuing animal tracing system (including database) referred section 63 animal health welfare act 2013 regulation 9 european union (animal identification tracing) regulation 2023 (s.i 254 2023) food business operator mean food business operator approved accordance regulation 5 european community (food feed hygiene) regulation 2019 (s.i no 674 2019)

title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: 3. These Regulations apply to the type or breed of protected animals to
text_raw:
3. These Regulations apply to the type or breed of protected animals to

which the collection of data applies.
text_norm: 3 regulation apply type breed protected animal collection data applies

title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: 4. The Minister may provide a food business operator access to data held
text_raw:
4. The Minister may provide a food business operator access to data held
on the Animal Identification and Movement system to verify the disease status 
and eligibility of an animal or animal product destined for the export market.
text_norm: 4 minister may provide food business operator access data held animal identification movement system verify disease status eligibility animal animal product destined export market

title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: 5. A food business operator shall not export to a third country an animal
text_raw:
5. A food business operator shall not export to a third country an animal
or animal product where the export conditions require the animal or animal 
product to meet certain criteria in relation to notifiable diseases, without first 
verifying that the animal or animal product is eligible for export on the Animal 
Identification and Movement system.
text_norm: 5 food business operator shall export third country animal animal product export condition require animal animal product meet certain criterion relation notifiable disease without first verifying animal animal product eligible export animal identification movement system

title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: 6. Regulation 5 is a penal provision to which section 63(5)(a) of the
text_raw:
6. Regulation 5 is a penal provision to which section 63(5)(a) of the

Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013) applies.
text_norm: 6 regulation 5 penal provision section 63(5)(a) animal health welfare act 2013 (no 15 2013) applies

title: 63 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 or regulation 9 of the European
heading: 7. The following Regulations are revoked-
text_raw:
7. The following Regulations are revoked-

(a)

The Animal Health and Welfare (Export) Regulations 2018 (S.I.
No. 145 of 2018).

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st June, 2024.
